Deemos climbs up onto a log and looks into the sky. At that moment, Clash f=
lies by. His inner circuitry started beeping the signal of someone with his=
 given out power that he needed to kill. He gasped. Psuedo? That certainly =
wasn't Psuedo, this guy had a different energy signature, but Psuedo's sign=
ature came from inside of him, as well as Plintissa, since that his scanner=
s detected that one of his men was inside of Clash. He then found Stranato =
and Inzola, as well as those 2 Airbomber and Time Warp, plus that guy that =
was hanging around Psuedo.

Deemos: Hey! Mafia, follow that robot!

Deemos =
ran far ahead, the rage in him building as he chased Clash from the ground.=
 Serge obeyed, following Deemos, but Deemos ran faster than ever before. Ri=
zopas and Doom Ice ran after Serge, followed by a complaining Diskus. Mobst=
er seperated into the Mini Mafia and ran after.

Shokaract looked to Jetsto=
rm, Godfather, and Sharpedge.

Shokaract: I guess we're going again, that i=
diot Deemos has to look at something again.

Shokaract changed to tank mode=
 and chased behind the rest...
